title: Bounty Hunter Mastery %5 Cap?
body: So as it says you deal 1% increased permanent damage for every "unique" champion you kill. So since a team is made up of 5 players does that mean that is a 5% cap since killing the same player wont count

replies.body: Not always, in Twisted treeline the cap is 3%, while in Hexakill mode you can get up to 6%.
A simple yes would've been a good answer, but I guess you can also digress.
Not always, sometimes you need to digress.
